field.name: description

comment.author: raztor
comment.text: Yep, got the same problem. I wonder if it is fixed in some release of VS. Or there is some workaround you know of :)

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: @AKA, no workaround as of now. Implementing this *properly* would require some deep internal changes, and considering we're on the verge of releasing Windsor 3 it will have to wait until next major version.

comment.author: raztor
comment.text: Thank you for your quick reply :))) We managed to workaround the problem. Strangely, this page is the only one I found referring to that problem. Anyway thanks again for replying so fast :)
